English: TYNWALD,
ST JOHN’S 5th July, 1932.
ABSTRACTS
OF
ACTS FOR PROMULGATION.
Printed by Authority by Brown & Sons, Limited, “Times” Buildings, Douglas.
ABSTRACTS OF ACTS OF TYNWALD.
1.— The Gas Regulation Amendment Act, 1927.
Manx: Yn Slattys Goardrail Gas Lhiasaghey, Nuy Cheead Nane Jeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the Gas Regulation Act, 1927, as to the testing of gas meters.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Goardrail Gas Nuy Cheead Yeig Shiaght as Feed bentyn da ronsaghey towshanyn-gas.

English: 2.— The Castletown Educational Endowments Act, 1931.
Manx: Yn Slattys Leggadyn Ynsagh Ballacashtal Nuy Cheead Yeig Nane Jeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to provide new trusts for the Castletown Grammar School endowments and the Catherine Halsall Girls’ School endowments.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail treishtyn noa son leggadyn yn Schoill Grammar Ballacashtal as leggadyn Katherine Halsall cour ynsaghey inneenyn.

English: 3.— The Companies Act, 1931.
Manx: Yn Slattys Sheshaghtyn Nuy Cheead Yeig Nane Jeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to consolidate the law as to companies.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy unnaneysey yn leigh mychione sheshaghtyn.

English: 4.— The Agricultural Produce (Grading and Marking) Act, 1931.
Manx: Yn Slattys Cooid Eirinys (Scarrey as Cowraghey) Nuy Cheead Yeig Nane Jeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to provide for grading and marking agricultural produce.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail son scarrey as cowraghey cooid eirinys.

English: 5.— The Income Tax (Amendment) No. 2 Act, 1931.
Manx: Yn Slattys Keesh Cosney Vleeanagh Lhiasaghey Nuy Cheead Yeig Nane Jeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the Income Tax Amendment Act, 1931, as to non-residents.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Keesh Cosney Vleeanagh Nuy Cheead Yeig Nane Jeig as Feed choud as t’eh bentyn da joarreeyn.

English: 6.— The Agricultural Credits Act, 1932.
Manx: 6.— Yn Slattys Daillyn da Eirinee Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to extend the definition of “improvements” in the Agricultural Credits Act, 1924.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lheeadaghey yn bree jeh “Kiartaghyn” ayns yn Slattys Daillyn da Eirinee Nuy Cheead Yeig Kiare as Feed.

English: 7.— The Married Women’s Protection Amendment  Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Coadey Mraane Phoost Lhiasaghey, Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the law as to separation orders.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn da saraghyn scarree.

English: 8.— The Rent (Restrictions) Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Mayll (Lhiettalyn) Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to prolong the Rent Restriction Acts.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy reayll bio ny Slattysyn Lhiettal Bishaght Mayll.

English: 9.— The Third Parties (Rights against Insurers) Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Trass Persoonyn (Cairyn Noi Raanteenyn) Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to confer rights on third parties against insurers.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy choyrt cairyn da trass persoonyn noi raanteenyn.

English: 10.— The Widows’, Orphans’ and Old Age Contributory Pensions Amendment  Act, 1932.
Manx: 10.— Yn Slattys Toyrtyn Choonee Mraane Treoghe Treoganyn as Shenn Eaysh Lhiasaghey Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the law as to widows’, orphans and old age contributory pensions.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn da toyrtyn-choonee mraane troghe treoghanyn as shenn eaysh.

English: 11.— The Education (Extension of Medical Treatment) Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Ynsagh Sheeyney Cooney-Lheiys Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to extend medical treatment to infants and young persons.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy heeyney cooney-lheihys gys paitchyn as sleih aeg.

English: 12.— The Ecclesiastical Residences and Dilapidations Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Cummalyn Killagh as Neuhickyrysyn Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to authorize the endowments of the See to be mortgaged for certain purposes.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lowal leggadyn yn Aspickys dy ve currit fo ghioalteeaght son oyryn er-lheh.

English: 13.— The Bishop’s Temporalities Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Cooid-Heihllt Yn Aspick, Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the Bishop’s Temporalities Act, 1878, and to provide for leases of the Bishop’s Glebe Lands.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn Slattys Cooid-Heihllt Yn Aspick Hoght Cheead Yeig Three Feed As Hoght Jeig as dy chiarail son barganeyn dy hoiaghey er mayll thalloo lhannee yn Aspick.

English: 14.— The Mental Diseases Amendment Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Doghanyn Aigney Lhiasaghey Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to amend the law as to the voluntary and temporary treatment of persons suffering from mental illness.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy lhiasaghey yn leigh bentyn da coadey arryltagh as tammyltagh jeh sleih fo doghan aigney.

English: 15.— The Wild Birds Protection Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Fendeilys Ushagyn Feie Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to protect wild birds.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy endeil ushagyn feie.

English: 16.— The Isle of Man Electric Light and Power Act, 1932.
Manx: Yn Slattys Soilshey as Pooar Electragh Nuy Cheead Yeig Daa-Yeig as Feed.

English: The object and purport of this Act is to provide for a supply of electricity throughout the Island outside the Douglas area.
Manx: Ta’n aigney as y chooish jeh’n Slattys shoh dy chiarail shirveish eloectragh trooid-magh yn Ellan cheu-mooie jeh Doolish.

English: The ROYAL ASSENT to the foregoing Acts was given on the dates set out hereunder :—
Manx: Va’n Choardail Reeoil currit gys ny Slattysyn roie enmyssit ec ny traaghyn fo soit magh :—

English: No. 1, 2, and 3, at Buckingham Palace  ........... 23rd July, 1931.
Manx: Earrooyn 1, 2 as 3,  ec y Plaase Buckingham ... 23oo VIIoo 1931.

English: No. 4, at Buckingham Palace  ........... 9th November, 1931.
Manx: Earroo 4, ec y Plaase Buckingham ... 9oo XIoo 1931.

English: No. 5, at Buckingham Palace  ........... 17th December, 1931.
Manx: Earroo 5 ec y Plaase Buckingham  ........... 17oo IIIoo 1932.

English: Nos. 6, 7, 8, and 9, at Buckingham Palace ........... 17th March, 1932.
Manx: Earrooyn 6, 7, 8 as 9, ec y Plaase Buckingham  ........... 17oo III 1932.

English: Nos. 10 and 11, at Windsor Castle  ........... 9th April, 1932.
Manx: Earrooyn 10 as 11 ec y Cashtal Windsor ........... 9oo IVoo 1932.

English: Nos. 12, 13, 14, 15, and 16, at Buckingham Palace 10th June, 1932.
Manx: Earrooyn 12, 13, 14, 15 as 16, ec y Plaase Buckingham ... 10oo VIoo 1932.
